description: I was looking online to find the format for QR code for WiFi and just noticed that Decoder has a built-in WiFi connection code generator. Very confinient, thank you.
summary: Handy app, pretty and great features

description: Great GUI - would be good for Linux on Phone!

One of the best apps of the GNOME ecosystem. It works as advertised and the interface is beautiful and easy to use. It's also very smooth to work with. I love that it has a history feature so that I can keep track of my scans and creations.
summary: Works well with a great and easy interface

description: Great app, it would be great if the app follow system theme to dark or light

When you scan a QR code you have to hit "Save" to see the contents. I get the UI flow but it isn't very intuitive or helpful I'm afraid.
There are only two data-type options: "Text" and "WiFi". The "URL" data-type would be nice, as well as options for other kinds of QR codes, like "Frame QR".
This app doesn't seem to register itself as a handler for images. It cannot have QR images dragged into it. You also cannot scan a QR code image from the clipboard.
When you have a big QR code you're making, even when you maximize the code stays scaled small.
If the camera option doesn't work, there's no "refresh" option to try again. You can switch tabs away and back to get it to try again though.
If fixed, I would replace QtQr with this
Connect to WiFi thru QR code is great
It just does what it says. You can easily create QR codes, no strings attached.
summary: It's simple, it works, nice App!

description: It looks good although it is missing the important URL
summary: could not find my camera in Peppermint

description: muy buena aplicacion nunca vi ninguna herramienta en donde puedas crear y escanear codigos QR
summary: muy buena para crear codigos QR

description: the application cant use camera on pinephone.
Pourquoi se limiter au qrcode? En généralisant sur tout type de code barre, cette application serait un basique indispensable. Beau boulot jusqu'ici.
summary: simple et efficace, on voit bien le potentiel

description: Does just what you expect from it.
Работает. С телефона считывается на ура. Вставил текст больше, чем смог распознать телефон. 5-ка.
